snippet: Olympics memorabilia, from an 1896 photograph to a 2012 poster, will be on sale in London this summer, along with major artifact exhibitions at museums in London, Athens and Berlin.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; Olympics memorabilia will be on sale at Bonhams in London, along with major artifact exhibitions at museums in London, Athens and Berlin; exhibit celebrating the 30th anniversary of the Intrepid Sea, Air & Space Museum opens July 2012; American Folk Art Museum's show Foiled: Tinsel Paintings in America opens September 2012.
lead_paragraph: Olympics memorabilia, from an 1896 photograph to a 2012 poster, will be on sale in London this summer, along with major artifact exhibitions at museums in London, Athens and Berlin.

headline.seo: Olympics Memorabilia in London Auctions and Museums
headline.main: Let the Games (and the Sales) Begin
headline.print_headline: Let the Games (and the Sales) Begin
